TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JavaScriptSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) should be used serialization and deserialization.

span.span: [Json.NET](http://www.newtonsoft.com/json) should be used serialization and deserialization.

summary.span: Provides serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.

span.span: Provides serialization and deserialization functionality for AJAX-enabled applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別可在內部由非同步通訊層來序列化和還原序列化的瀏覽器與 Web 伺服器之間傳遞的資料。The class is used internally by the asynchronous communication layer to serialize and deserialize the data that is passed between the browser and the Web server. 您無法存取該執行個體的序列化程式。You cannot access that instance of the serializer. 不過，這個類別會公開公用 API。However, this class exposes a public API. 因此，您可以使用此類別，當您想要使用 managed 程式碼與 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON)。Therefore, you can use the class when you want to work with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) in managed code. 若要將物件序列化，使用方法。To serialize an object, use the method. 若要還原序列化 JSON 字串，使用或方法。To deserialize a JSON string, use the or methods. 序列化和還原序列化原生不支援的類型，使用實作自訂轉換器類別。To serialize and deserialize types that are not natively supported by , implement custom converters by using the class. 使用，以註冊轉換器方法。Then register the converters by using the method. ## Managed 型別與 JSON 之間的對應Mapping Between Managed Types and JSON 下表顯示序列化處理序 managed 型別與 JSON 之間的對應。The following table shows the mapping between managed types and JSON for the serialization process. 這些 managed 的類型原生支援。These managed types are natively supported by . 當您指向 managed 類型的還原序列化來自 JSON 字串時，則會套用相同的對應。When you are deserializing from a JSON string to a managed type, the same mapping applies. 不過，還原序列化可能會非對稱式;並非所有可序列化的 managed 的類型都可以從 JSON 還原序列化。However, deserialization can be asymmetric; not all serializable managed types can be deserialized from JSON. > [!NOTE] > 多維陣列序列化為一維陣列，以及您應該使用它做為一般陣列。A multidimensional array is serialized as a one-dimensional array, and you should use it as a flat array. |Managed 的類型Managed type|JSON 的對等項目JSON equivalent| |------------------|---------------------| | (Utf-8 編碼方式僅)。 (UTF-8 encoding only).|StringString| ||StringString| |單一的 null 字元 （例如，\0)Single null char (such as, \0 )|NullNull| ||布林值。Boolean. 以做為 json 格式代表`true`或 `false`Represented in JSON as `true` or `false`| |`null` (`null`的物件參考和實值型別)。`null` (`null` object references and value types).|字串值是 nullA string value of null| ||字串值是 nullA string value of null| |基本的數字 （或數值相容） 類型： ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及。Primitive numeric (or numeric-compatible) types: , , , , , , , , , and . 會使用的文化特性而異的字串表示。The culture-invariant string representation is used.|numberNumber| ||Date 物件，以做為 json 格式代表 「\\日期 （的刻度數）/\\/"。Date object, represented in JSON as "\\/Date(number of ticks)\\/". 正數或負數的長值，指出刻度 （毫秒） 01 年 1 月，1970 UTC 午夜起已經過數的刻度數。The number of ticks is a positive or negative long value that indicates the number of ticks (milliseconds) that have elapsed since midnight 01 January, 1970 UTC.

受支援的最大日期值是(9999 年 12/31/11:59:59 PM) 和最小支援的日期值是(1/1/0001 上午 12:00:00)。The maximum supported date value is (12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM) and the minimum supported date value is (1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM).| |列舉型別是整數類型Enumerations of integer type|列舉值的整數對等項目Integer equivalent of the enumeration value| |型別都會實作或是不是也實作或。Types that implement or that are not also implementations of or . 這包括類型，例如， ，和。This includes types such as , , and .|使用 JSON 陣列語法的陣列Array that uses JSON array syntax| |型別都會實作或。Types that implement or . 這包括類型，例如和。This includes types such as and .|使用 JSON 字典語法的 JavaScript 物件JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax| |自訂具體 （非抽象） 類型的公用執行個體屬性的 get 存取子或公用執行個體欄位。Custom concrete (non-abstract) types that have public instance properties that have get accessors or public instance fields.

請注意公用的唯寫屬性，公用屬性或公用欄位屬性標示與，而且會忽略在這些類型的公用索引的屬性。Note that public write-only properties, public property or public field attributes marked with , and public indexed properties in these types are ignored.|使用 JSON 字典語法的 JavaScript 物件。JavaScript object that uses JSON dictionary syntax. 若要確保正確的還原序列化包含一個名為"__type"的特殊中繼資料屬性。A special metadata property named "__type" is included to ensure correct deserialization. 請確定公用執行個體屬性有 get 和 set 存取子，以確保正確的還原序列化。Make sure that public instance properties have get and set accessors to ensure correct deserialization.| ||在 GUID 的字串表示法String representation of a GUID| ||傳回值的字串表示法 String representation of the return value of | ## Examples 第一個範例提供簡單說明如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件。The first example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. 它需要類別名稱是如下所示的人員。It requires a class names Person which is shown below. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)] 下一個範例顯示更複雜且完整的專案使用儲存和還原物件的狀態，藉由使用 JSON 序列化的類別。The next example shows a more complicated and complete project that uses the class to save and restore the state of an object by using JSON serialization. 此程式碼會使用所提供的自訂轉換器類別。This code uses a custom converter that is provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#4)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has no type resolver.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has no type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體類別沒有類型解析程式不包含序列化的 JSON 字串中的型別中繼資料屬性 （名為"__type"）。An instance of the class without a type resolver does not include type metadata properties (named "__type") in the serialized JSON string. 型別中繼資料屬性由和方法來判斷適當的 managed 類型的 JSON 字串轉換。A type metadata property is used by the and methods to determine the appropriate managed type to which the JSON string will be converted. 類型解析程式的相關資訊，請參閱類別。For information about type resolvers, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavaScriptSerializer (System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver resolver) cil managed
Public Sub New (resolver As JavaScriptTypeResolver)
public: JavaScriptSerializer(System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptTypeResolver ^ resolver);
new System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer : System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptTypeResolver -> System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer

span.span: The custom type-resolver object.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a custom type resolver.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that has a custom type resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，它會設定序列化時類別會使用`resolver`參數來決定要包含在序列化的 JSON 字串型別中繼資料屬性 ("__type") 中的適當值。When it is serializing an object, the class uses the `resolver` parameter to determine the appropriate value to include in the serialized JSON string for the type metadata property ("__type"). 同樣地，當類別所還原序列化 JSON 字串，以適當的 managed 型別解析型別中繼資料屬性值使用解析程式執行個體。Similarly, when the class is deserializing a JSON string, it resolves the type metadata property value to the appropriate managed type by using the resolver instance. 您可以設定`resolver`參數來`null`，這相當於呼叫建構函式。You can set the `resolver` parameter to `null`, which is equivalent to calling the constructor. 執行個體所用的非同步通訊層叫用 Web 服務用戶端指令碼會使用特殊的型別解析程式。The instance of that is used by the asynchronous communication layer for invoking Web services from client script uses a special type resolver. 這個型別解析程式將可還原序列化的型別限制為 Web 服務的方法簽章或項目中定義的套用。This type resolver restricts the types that can be deserialized to those defined in the Web service’s method signature, or the ones that have the applied. 您無法以程式設計方式修改這個內建型別解析程式。You cannot modify this built-in type resolver programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用具有自訂類型解析程式初始化此物件的執行個體可以有安全性風險。Using an instance of this object initialized with a custom type-resolver can present a security risk. 此物件只能用於信任的資料。Use this object only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

param.name: targetType
param.span: The type to convert the object to.

span.span: The type to convert the object to.

summary.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.

span.span: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行個體序列化為其註冊自訂轉換器，類型的序列化程式呼叫方法，以取得將轉換成 JSON 格式的字串的名稱/值組的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON-formatted string. 方法也可以擲回例外狀況物件圖形太過複雜，則已註冊的執行個體造成轉換器遞迴。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion.

exception.span: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of .

span.span: The resulting JSON-formatted string exceeds the value of .

exception.span: -or- contains a circular reference.

span.span: -or- contains a circular reference.

exception.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.

span.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.

member this.ConvertToType : obj -> 'T

summary.span: Converts the given object to the specified type.

span.span: Converts the given object to the specified type.

returns.span: The object that has been converted to the target type.

span.span: The object that has been converted to the target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會嘗試將物件執行個體所表示的轉換`obj`型別的執行個體`T`。The method tries to convert the object instance that is represented by `obj` to an instance of type `T`. 此轉換期間中，則無法保證會保留物件參考是否相等。During this conversion there is no guarantee that object reference equality is maintained. 因此，您無法假設`obj`和`T`參考相同的物件。Therefore, you cannot assume that `obj` and `T` refer to the same object. 要用於實作的類別，衍生自。 is intended to be used if you implement a class that derives from . 必須要能夠採用序列化程式傳遞給它，字典中的值轉換子的程式碼，並將其然後將該值轉換為類型的執行個體`T`。Converter code must be able to take a value that is in the dictionary that the serializer passes to it, and then convert that value to an instance of type `T`. 而不是重新實作自訂的轉換程式碼來執行這項工作中，您可以呼叫從轉換子的程式碼的方法。Instead of re-implementing the custom conversion code to perform this task, you can call the method from the converter code. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以取得從傳遞至轉換器的字典中值的物件。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain a object from a value in the dictionary that is passed to the converter. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/App_Code/ListItemCollectionConverter.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就相當於設定使用的第一個方法，以取得物件圖形，然後嘗試將結果轉換成輸入`T`。The method is equivalent to first using the method to obtain an object graph and then trying to cast the result to type `T`. 還原序列化期間，目前型別解析程式的序列化程式的參考，以決定轉換都放在陣列和字典類型的項目時要使用的 managed 的類型。During deserialization, the serializer’s current type resolver is referenced, which determines the managed type to use when converting elements that are nested inside arrays and dictionary types. 如此一來，還原序列化程序會逐一查看所有巢狀項目`input`。As a result, the deserialization process iterates through all nested elements of `input`. 如需型別解析程式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about type resolvers, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例提供簡單說明如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要一個名為類別`Person`，這下列範例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: -or- contains a "__type" property that indicates either or a non-instantiable type (for example, an abstract type or an interface).

span.span: -or- An attempt was made to convert a JSON array to an array-like managed type that is not supported for use as a JSON deserialization target.

exception.span: -or- It is not possible to convert to the target type.

.property instance int32 MaxJsonLength
Public Property MaxJsonLength As Integer
public: property int MaxJsonLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxJsonLength : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the class.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of JSON strings that are accepted by the class.
The maximum length of JSON strings.

value.span: 預設值為 2097152 個字元，這相當於 4 MB 的 Unicode 字串資料。

span.span: The default is 2097152 characters, which is equivalent to 4 MB of Unicode string data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性適用於只有當您明確建立的執行個體類別。The value of the property applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`組態檔來設定內部的序列化程式執行個體，以供非同步通訊層的最大長度的項目。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the maximum length for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 如需詳細的組態項目，進行序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

.property instance int32 RecursionLimit
Public Property RecursionLimit As Integer
public: property int RecursionLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RecursionLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.

span.span: Gets or sets the limit for constraining the number of object levels to process.
The number of object levels.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考的物件階層中的層級數目的會處理在下列情況：The property refers to the number of levels in the object hierarchy that will process in the following cases: - 當類別所還原序列化 JSON 字串。When the class is deserializing a JSON string. - 當類別在序列化期間查核物件圖形。When the class is walking an object graph during serialization. 值適用於只有當您明確建立的執行個體類別。The value of applies only when you explicitly create an instance of the class. 使用`jsonSerialization`組態檔來設定物件來處理內部的序列化程式執行個體，以供非同步通訊層的層級數目的項目。Use the `jsonSerialization` element of the configuration file to set the number of object levels to process for the internal serializer instance that is used by the asynchronous communication layer. 如需詳細的組態項目，進行序列化的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 設定 ASP.NET 服務在 Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30)。For more information about the configuration elements for serialization, see [How to: Configure ASP.NET Services in Microsoft Ajax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ea4fb56e-bc1d-405a-9877-00cf5e552a30).

exception.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

span.span: The property is set to a value that is less than one.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterConverters (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters);
.method public hidebysig instance void RegisterConverters(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> converters) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterConverters (converters As IEnumerable(Of JavaScriptConverter))
public: void RegisterConverters(System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Web::Script::Serialization::JavaScriptConverter ^> ^ converters);
member this.RegisterConverters : seq<System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptConverter> -> unit

param.name: converters
param.span: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.

span.span: An array that contains the custom converters to be registered.

summary.span: Registers a custom converter with the instance.

span.span: Registers a custom converter with the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以註冊使用的一或多個自訂轉換器使用的執行個體方法。You can register one or more custom converters with a instance by using the method. 註冊自訂轉換器時,使用轉換器，將 managed 的類型序列化和還原序列化 JSON 字串為 managed 型別。When custom converters are registered, uses the converters both to serialize managed types and to deserialize JSON strings to managed types. 多個轉換器可以註冊具有相同執行個體，以及這些轉換子可以指出相同類型的支援。Multiple converters can be registered with the same instance, and these converters can indicate support for the same type. 如此一來，針對特定類型註冊的最後一個轉換子是可供為序列化的型別。As a result, the last converter that is registered for a specific type is the one that will be used by to serialize the type. 如需有關自訂轉換器的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about custom converters, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何註冊自訂轉換器，且執行個體。The following example shows how to register a custom converter with a instance. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.Serialization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Serialization/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Serialize (object obj);

Public Function Serialize (obj As Object) As String
public: System::String ^ Serialize(System::Object ^ obj);
member this.Serialize : obj -> string

span.span: The object to serialize.

summary.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.

span.span: Converts an object to a JSON string.
The serialized JSON string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行個體序列化為其註冊自訂轉換器，類型的序列化程式呼叫方法，以取得會轉換成 JSON 字串的名稱/值組的字典。When the instance is serializing a type for which a custom converter is registered, the serializer calls the method to obtain the dictionary of name/value pairs that will be converted to a JSON string. 方法也可以擲回例外狀況物件圖形太過複雜，則已註冊的執行個體造成轉換器遞迴。The method can also throw exceptions if the object graph is too complex, or if registered instances of have caused converter recursion. ## Examples 下列範例提供簡單說明如何序列化和還原序列化資料物件。The following example provides a simple illustration of how to serialize and deserialize data objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)] 它需要一個名為類別`Person`，這下列範例所示。It requires a class named `Person`, which is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/cs/default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Script.JavaScriptSerializer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.script.serialization.javascriptserializer/vb/default.aspx.vb#2)]

span.span: -or- contains a circular reference.

span.span: A circular reference occurs when a child object has a reference to a parent object, and the parent object has a reference to the child object.

exception.span: The recursion limit defined by was exceeded.
